thread.title: New rape crisis centres for Aberystwyth and Newtown set to open
thread.title_full: New rape crisis centres for Aberystwyth and Newtown set to open - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: New rape crisis centres for Aberystwyth and Newtown set to open
text: Two new rape crisis centres for mid Wales are on schedule to open by the end of the year. The Â£121,000 UK government-funded suites will be based in Aberystwyth in Ceredigion, and Newtown in Powys. Dyfed-Powys Police currently has just one specialist centre, in Carmarthen. A spokesman for the force's police and crime commissioner said the facilities had been completed and would open to the public once final contracts had been signed. Share this story About sharing
